title: Interpretation of the appearance of pregnancy in a dream for a married or unmarried woman

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream is one of the most promising dreams, which has many interpretations that differ if the dreamer is a man, a married woman, or a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream varies according to the scene of the nipple, such as: I dreamed that I was pregnant and my stomach was large, or my friend dreamed that I was pregnant and that my stomach was large. We will try to shed light on some interpretations of this vision, but our site always advises that any interpretation we provide for any other vision that is similar to the vision we present should not be rejected, because the conclusion from the interpretation of a dream at the end of the dream is one of the things that dream interpretation scholars have confirmed to be incorrect. See Also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the appearance of pregnancy in a dream for a married and unmarried woman. The unmarried girl who saw the campaign in a dream while she was not married, this may indicate good news that this girl will receive, but with difficulty. Also, pregnancy in a girl’s dream is not A married woman could be an indication of this girl’s connection to a person with good characteristics, and God knows best. In addition to the fact that an unmarried girl sees herself pregnant in a dream, this may be a sign of success in studies, and God knows best. Likewise, an unmarried girl who dreams that she is pregnant and appears pregnant. Signs of sadness, this may indicate the fears that you feel. See also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing pregnancy in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees in a dream that she is pregnant and has children, this may indicate the abundance of sustenance that this woman will receive during the coming period - God willing - Just like a married woman who dreams that she is pregnant in a dream and does not have children, this woman can depend on humans to get pregnant soon - God willing. Seeing pregnancy in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees pregnancy in a dream, this person can be to get rid of problems. Mother of pregnancy. Likewise, when a pregnant woman sees pregnancy in a dream, this may be good news for her about facilitating childbirth - God willing. In addition to the fact that a pregnant woman sees herself pregnant in a dream, this may indicate the fears that this woman feels about Birth. See also: Penguin in a dream. I dreamed that I was pregnant and my stomach was large. When you see a pregnancy in a dream and a large belly, this may be an indication of the abundance of money that the pregnant woman will receive. Also, this dream may indicate the presence of some family problems or feelings of anxiety and sadness. In addition In addition, the presence of a large belly in a dream for a pregnant woman may indicate that childbirth will be easy. My friend dreamed that I was pregnant and my stomach was large. When a friend dreams that his friend is pregnant and that her stomach is large, this may be a sign that it erases her fears of sorrows and abundant goodness in the future - God willing - This dream may also indicate the pregnancy of his girlfriend if she was not pregnant before him. See also: Washing the dead. I am married and dreamed that I was pregnant. A married woman could be pregnant.

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a hyena in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a hyena in one’s dreams has many good and bad connotations that depend on the type and condition of the dreamer in the dream, and we will learn about all the interpretations in detail below. Seeing a hyena in a dream Seeing a hyena in a dream is considered a completely undesirable sign because it indicates that he is a cunning person and intentionally harms others. Seeing hyenas In the dream, it indicates that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies who are trying to destroy his life, but confronting them and controlling them means that God will stand by him and grant him victory over them. Seeing hyenas in a dream may indicate to the dreamer that the people around him are using magic without knowledge, and the dream may be a warning to stay away from them. A woman’s dream of a hyena in a dream indicates that she has bad qualities that make the people around her hate her. A person’s dream of a hyena may indicate that he is far from God and Islamic values ​​and that he is committing immorality. Seeing a hyena in a dream and having its milk symbolizes betrayal and treachery that will happen to the dreamer from those around him. A man’s dream that he is biting a hyena and watching it could be a sign that a woman is trying to establish a forbidden relationship with him. For a person to notice that there is a hyena attacking him and that he can control it indicates crises and trials that he will face in the future. As for a woman, scientists have interpreted the hyena that attacks a woman in a dream. However, it is evidence that she is subject to restrictions and jealousy from the people around her. Seeing a hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a hyena in a dream as a person whose heart is filled with hatred and jealousy towards the dreamer, but he is weak and unable to harm him or confront the dreamer. The scientist explained that the dream of a human being A hyena and a lion in a dream means that he is surrounded by two enemies, one of which is strong, which is the lion, and the other is weak, which is represented by the hyena. The dreamer’s vision of a hyena with a snake and a crocodile indicates a cunning man in the dreamer’s life who uses powerful people to destroy the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin also explained that seeing a hyena in some dreams could mean that you Fell into adultery. Seeing a person as training hyenas symbolizes his strength and mental and physical strength. Seeing a hyena in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing hyenas in a dream as meaning that the dreamer will enter a new project and be betrayed and deceived by his partners. The scholar pointed out that hyenas in a dream represent A bad woman, and for a man when he sees a hyena in a dream, this indicates the presence of a woman with rude morals who is trying to get close to him, and life is of her own free will. Be miserable. If a man gets married and sees a hyena sleeping in his bed, then this dream indicates that his wife has bad morals. The person who sees a hyena in his dream is interpreted as being interested in matters of magic and sorcery and believes in them, and in the dream it is a lesson to abandon such thoughts. Seeing a hyena in A dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl who sees a hyena in her dream indicates that she is marrying a treacherous and cunning person who wants to harm her and she must stay away from him. When a single girl sees that someone she knows has the head of a hyena and that he is a bad-tempered person, she must take precautions against him so that he does not cause her problems. Seeing the girl a

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child bathing in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing a child bathing in a dream on different occasions. Children are the source of joy and happiness in life, and the look on their faces can make you forget problems and fears. They have enough innocence to make you distracted from the world and what is inside them, and in an instant you turned into a child as if they were playing and having fun with them. The dream of seeing a child bathing or bathing in a dream has many interpretations that we will mention to you today on our website. An article on the Encyclopedia.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child washing in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great translator Ibn Sirin believes that a child in a dream is a sign of nourishment, happiness, and blessings, and seeing a male child could be a sign of troubles and troubles for the fortuneteller. As for washing a child in a dream, it is a sign On his repentance and cleansing him of sins, disobedience, and transgressions. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child bathing in a dream for a single woman: Ibn Sirin interprets an unmarried woman who finds herself in her dream bathing or bathing her child as an indication that she will enter a new stage in her life, whether that is by obtaining A new job, business opportunity, or perhaps marriage. Seeing an unmarried woman washing a child may indicate that she is suffering from a group of sins and misdeeds that she regrets and will repent to God for them and begin a new life for the sake of God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child washing in a dream for a married woman: Dreaming of washing a child in a dream is good for livelihood. Good offspring, God willing, for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she has given birth, this indicates that she is pregnant, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child bathing in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she is bathing a beautiful-looking child, this is a sign that her fetus is female, God willing. And she has wonderful beauty, as she is a good and pious girl. For her mother. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child washing a child in a dream for a man: For a man who dreams that he is washing or bathing a child, this is good news for him about the arrival of money and a lot of livelihood in the event that the child enjoys a degree of beauty. A man who sees a child in his dream can herald Good luck for getting a job, achieving an excellent position, or getting married if he is single. The best dream to see washing a child in a dream: Washing a child in a dream indicates the end of the dreamer’s worries, sorrows, and problems. Whoever finds in a dream that he is bathing or washing a child, this is a sign that he will enjoy prosperity. In life and it will come to him with great pleasure and his world will accept him, because the girl in the dream expresses worldly life. If the child who is washing or bathing laughs and rejoices in the water, then this is good news about the coming of joy, beautiful events and happy news for the fortuneteller. The bad dream of seeing a child bathing in a dream: If If the child being washed is bad-looking or ugly, this is a sign that the dreamer will suffer from worries and sorrows and will not be able to overcome the sorrows and problems he faces in his life. As for refusing to wash the child or not removing the dirt from him, this is a sign of the dreamer and his perseverance in committing sins and misdeeds. Great or continued injustice to others without referring to the truth

For her mother. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child washing a child in a dream for a man: For a man who dreams that he is washing or bathing a child, this is good news for him about the arrival of money and a lot of livelihood if the child has a degree of beauty. A man who sees a child in his dream can herald good news for getting a job or achieving an excellent position or getting married if he is single. The best dream to see washing a child in a dream: Washing a child in a dream indicates the end of the dreamer's worries, sorrows and problems. And whoever finds in a dream that he is bathing or washing a child, this is a sign that he enjoys prosperity in life and will come to him with great pleasure and his world will accept him, because the girl in the dream expresses worldly life. If the child who is washing or bathing laughs and rejoices in the water, this is good news about the coming of joy, beautiful events and happy news for the fortune teller. The bad dream of seeing a child washing in a dream: If the child being washed is bad-looking or ugly, this is a sign that the dreamer will suffer from worries and sorrows and will not be able to overcome the sorrows and problems he faces in His life. As for refusing to wash the child or not removing the dirt from him, this is a sign of the dreamer and his persistence in committing major sins and transgressions or his continued injustice to others without referring to the truth.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing nails in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of putting nails in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says: Seeing a person in a dream riding his nails indicates disappointment in the dreamer’s condition, and God knows best. Also, seeing artificial nails in a dream and putting them on indicates worries, problems, and blows that will appear in the coming days. Also, it may Seeing nails put on the hand to decorate it indicates that the person who sees it is social and needs to form new people and create new relationships. Interpretation of putting nails in a dream for a single woman: Seeing putting artificial nails in a dream and taking them off with them indicates that he is a deceptive person and has lied to many people. If a girl sees someone who is not... A married woman herself buys new nails, then this vision indicates happiness, abundant livelihood, and plentiful money. Also, when seeing artificial nails placed in a dream for cosmetic purposes, this indicates the difficulties that the dreamer is going through in his life. Also, seeing ugly nails placed in a dream indicates The problems, worries, and disagreements that occur, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting nails for a married woman: Seeing putting artificial nails expresses the woman’s many sorrows and the differences that occur between her and her husband, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is putting nails, this indicates the collapse of the differences between us and her husband and those who For happiness. This dream also heralds the birth of a new baby and her imminent pregnancy, and indicates good health and long life, and God knows best. This vision also indicates that her husband will join a new job and that her children will receive the best education and their efforts in studying. Interpretation of a dream about putting nails for a woman Pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is applying nails, this indicates the elimination of the woman’s worries and the ease of a quick birth. Also, seeing artificial nails applied shows many differences between her and her husband and shows that she gave birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Also, seeing the purchase of nails that are placed indicates a great deal. Of money and livelihood, and that her husband will join a new employee, and the gains of abundant and lawful money. Interpretation of the vision of putting nails for a man: Seeing artificial nails put in a beautiful young man’s dream indicates his close marriage to a deceitful girl who is not fit for God and for him. If a person sees in a dream that he is putting his nails, then this It indicates many delusions, problems, and misfortunes that he will experience in the coming period. Also, a dream about wearing nails like girls indicates the dreamer’s death and many sorrows and problems that he presents to his relatives, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team will Experts will reply to you as soon as possible.

title: Seeing a white chicken in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing a white chicken in a dream for a married woman. There are many interpretations of this dream for a married woman, and one of the most important interpretations given by great interpreters is: If the condition of the chicken is raw, this is a sign of comfort and pleasure. And the peace of mind that insight will have in her life. It is also an indication of the happiness that she will feel. With her husband. And that their lives be full of understanding, friendliness, and emotional harmony. But if the dreamer sees herself slaughtering this chicken in a dream. This is a sign of her husband’s betrayal and that he has feelings for another woman, so she should be careful. There is no need to worry because God Almighty will help her husband return to her. If the chicken in the dream is not ready to eat. This is a sign that the fortuneteller is suffering from many problems and disturbances between her and her husband. The commentators said that if he sees a large number of this type of chicken in the dream, he has not conceived any children yet. This is a sign that she will become pregnant soon. Moreover, God has blessed her with good offspring in the near future. It could also be a sign of sustenance with a lot of money and health. In case she sees her husband buying this item and recommending it to her. This is a strong indication that she will find comfort And peace and contentment in her relationship with her husband. Also, the previous vision could indicate that you will have a child in the near future. In case the dreamer sees herself cleaning a group of these chickens at a feast. This is a sign that he will soon receive a lot of good news. See also: Interpretation of seeing chicken eggs in a dream: The dream of a white chicken for Ibn Sirin’s married wife. We continue to talk about the interpretation of seeing a white chicken in a dream for a married woman, and we refer to the interpretation of one of the best dream interpreters of all time, in the following points: This respected scholar sees this type of chicken. It is a reference to The great effort that the dreamer makes in her life to make her life full of happiness and joy. As he said, if the dreamer finds a group of this type running after her in the dream. This is an indication of the presence of some impostors in the environment. These hypocrites are also trying to sabotage her life with her husband. And they are trying Constantly causing her trouble and misfortune, so she must be careful. She also explained that the dreamer who sees this dream will have a lot of sustenance in the near future. It is possible that she will become famous in her field of work. Then he added to his words and said that this dream is evidence that he will soon reach A famous and different social status, God willing. She also said that if the fortuneteller is exposed to a financial problem, she and her husband. After this vision, God will comfort them and their distress will go away. In the event that the fortuneteller eats parts of this kind, this is an indication that she has traveled. Or is entering a new project with her husband. This will change their lives dramatically.Interpretation of seeing a married white chicken for NabulsiNabulsi is one of the best dream interpreters ever. He interpreted this dream as follows: This scholar believes that seeing this man in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of her inability to bear more pressures that are coming.

title: Interpretation of a dream about vomiting or vomiting in a dream - see the most accurate opinions

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about vomiting or vomiting in a dream from the point of view of Ibn Sirin and the great interpreters of dreams, and see all the interpretations of seeing vomiting in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about vomiting Vomiting in a dream, if it is easy, may indicate the good that the dreamer will achieve and perhaps the dreamer’s repentance Of sins, perhaps this indicates the return of rights to those who deserve them. But if the vomiting is difficult, then it is not good. Whoever sees that he ate vomit, his dream shows his stinginess and miserliness. And whoever thinks that he is trying to vomit but is unable, or that the vomit has returned from his throat, then his dream It indicates the difficulty of his repentance. See also: Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the mouth. Perhaps seeing vomiting indicates a disease in which vomiting is annoying and may indicate recovery from the disease. Whoever vomits and his vomit is black, his dream shows the end of his worries and sorrows. Seeing vomiting hair means the end of magic. And seeing vomiting with honey means repentance. Interpretation of a dream about reset: Whoever thinks that he is vomiting pearls, the dream indicates that the dreamer will be influenced by the interpretation of the Qur’an. And seeing a lot of vomit indicates that the fortuneteller will give him a good child. To dream of vomiting blood indicates the livelihood of children. preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Teeth falling out in different situations that people see in their natural life cycle, teeth falling out during what we call the transitional stage in early childhood, as well as when a person grows up and reaches old age or old age. But does it become normal if it comes in a dream? Then what about its interpretation? We will learn this in different cases through the following article of the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of Dreams and Loss of Teeth. Interpretation of Dreams, Teeth Falling If a tooth falls from the mouth of the fortune teller, this inevitably means that someone's death is approaching or the fortune teller's fear of old age. It is also interpreted by his absence from someone for a period after which they have not seen him. If the fortune teller buries this tooth: a blessing, but if he buries it, it means someone's death and his attendance at his funeral. But if he sees that he is extracting this tooth, he benefits from his money by force or that he does not reach his mercy. Losing a tooth with blood indicates that the date of birth is close to his wife or a relative of his and that the newborn is male. A decrease in age can also indicate anxiety about the transitional stage that the viewer is going through at work or in personal life. If a person loses his upper tooth, it means losing an ally or friend, while losing a lower tooth means losing an enemy or competitor. A decrease in age can also be interpreted by paying off all debts at once. If an unmarried woman sees one of her lower teeth falling out, this means abandoning the lover or separating from her fiancé with whom she feels happy, comfortable and miserable, or that she is making expensive deals and she has to Rethinking it, this may symbolize. Her lack of ability to make a very important decision. As for the married woman, this means her happiness with the birth of her child or her extreme fear for her children. Also, the loss of the husband's teeth can indicate the married or pregnant woman and this is an indication of problems between them or that the children of either of them are at a weak level in their studies and they must be monitored. On a regular basis. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out may indicate a lack of money or parents. It can refer to the man's household or his minor children. It was also said in the interpretation of losing a tooth that it is a debt that God Almighty pays on his behalf, or a trust that he pays to its owners. Or it means ending the relationship of the womb. Ibn Sirin interpreted the fall of the upper molar as long-term compared to the ages of the seer's peers, while the fall of the lower molar is pain and illusion. As for the one who thought that the tooth had fallen from his hand, it is the death of one of the children. The loss of a molar for a pregnant woman means that her next child is a male, and for the husband, it is the pregnancy of his wife or reconciliation with his brother. For unmarried women, the loss of a molar means longing for joy, unless she steps on it with her foot. Interpretation of a dream about a dog falling out without pain If the fortune teller is single, this means that she has lost someone she loves and does not regret it, but rather is looking for someone to compensate her for this loss. The fall of the canine tooth indicates the difficulties and pains that the fortune teller faces or the presence of disagreements with parents and relatives. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out Its interpretation does not differ from the loss of natural teeth, and if it is above that, it indicates disagreements with the man's relatives or the man's husband. If s

title: Interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream.. Interpretation of a dream about a wheel

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream. The wheel is a means of transportation that has spread recently, especially after the severe traffic jams and problems caused by cars. It is certain that seeing a bicycle in a dream carries many interpretations, which we will refer to you today through this article on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream. A bicycle in a dream by Ibn Sirin: According to Ibn Sirin, a motorcycle is a sign of the dreamer’s life, future, and personality. If the dreamer finds that he is riding a bicycle on a straight road, this is a sign that he has a direct personality. But if he sees that he is riding a bicycle on a road full of slopes This is a sign that he is not upright in his life, and that he has many humiliations and mistakes from which he must return. Interpretations of seeing a bicycle in a dream vary. In some cases, it is a sign that the dreamer is exposed to great fears and difficulties in life, and at other times it is a symbol of success and superiority. Interpretation of seeing a wheel in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is riding a bike, her vision shows that she is determined to succeed in her life. And she is very ambitious. If one person’s path in a dream is straight, this means that he will have an easy path to achieving his goals, but if the path is full of curves and slopes, then this is a sign of the obstacles that she will face in achieving her goals. The interpretation of a bike in a person’s dream varies depending on its color. A red bike is a sign that she is going through an emotional relationship, and a yellow bike is a sign of her constant confusion and stress. If unmarried people buy a bike in a dream, this is a sign of many successes and differences that they will achieve in their lives. If a single woman falls off a bike in a dream, she will lose Some things or people dear to her, such as her lover or her job. Interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream for a married woman: A bicycle in a dream for a married woman shows her funny attitude. The straight road on which the bike travels is a sign that he is in a good mood, while the road full of slopes and turns is a sign of marital problems that he will face. Interpretation of seeing a bike in a dream for a pregnant woman: The road that a pregnant woman takes on a bicycle is a sign of pregnancy, so if If it was straight, this is evidence that she will give birth to her fetus without difficulty or problems. As for a crooked road, or one that contains dangerous obstacles, it is evidence that the pregnant woman is going through many problems during pregnancy, so a doctor must be monitored. A bicycle could be in a pregnant woman’s dream. A sign of a woman giving birth, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream for a man: The interpretation of a bicycle in a pregnant woman’s dream varies, as it could be an indication of his urgent need for many things or his speed in taking some actions, without being careful of the consequences of these actions. A bicycle can indicate In a dream, to a reckless or open-minded person. And if the dreamer is going to marry or mingle, he will communicate with a girl who is characterized by urgency or impulsiveness.

title: Prostration in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing kneeling in a dream: What does the symbol of kneeling mean in the dream of a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman? Does the place where the dreamer worships in the vision have any sign worth mentioning? Learn about the most famous and accurate indicators of seeing bowing in a dream, and read them below. Worship in a dream: Seeing prostration in a dream is interpreted with many meanings and varies according to the place of prostration in the dream and whether the prayer clothes are appropriate or not? What was the general atmosphere prevailing in the dream as a whole? Follow the following: The dreamer’s bowing at home is evidence of happiness, marital and family bonding, and many blessings that will soon spread in the home. Seeing prostration in the workplace means a lot of sustenance for the pioneer and he may obtain a wonderful career opportunity or obtain He will receive financial compensation and a promotion soon. The fortuneteller kneeling in the bathroom or toilet is evidence of heresy and disbelief, God forbid. If the dreamer worships in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca, then the dream indicates Umrah or Hajj as well as the fulfillment of desires. If the dreamer prostrates in the Holy Prophet’s Mosque in In a dream, he cherishes the religion of God and the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, and applies all the instructions, rulings, and Sunnahs of the Prophet. The dreamer bends down in an open place and rain falls on him while prostrating in the dream, which indicates the relief of stress and the removal of worries. Prostrating in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin gave good news to the dreamers who see that they prostrated in a dream. Their dreams are good news, and he said that the vision is interpreted by wishes that come true and supplications that are accepted. Whoever lives in constant fear and threat while awake and sees that he is worshiping God and feels safe in a dream is immune and receives protection from the Lord of the Worlds and none of his enemies will be able to challenge him. Harm and damage. Whoever commits immorality and begins to repent for his actions in reality, and sees in a dream that he prostrated and prostrated for a long time, then this is good news that the Lord of the Worlds has opened the door of forgiveness for him and will forgive him. His previous actions. If the sick person worships God in the dream, he will be strengthened and his body will be healed of diseases, God willing. Whoever lives his life according to his desires and whims in reality, and sees that he is praying and worshiping in the dream, then he believes in God and does good deeds until he removes his sins and replaces them with good deeds. Prostrating in a dream to the imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq said: If a believer worships God in a dream, he lives in secret and his life is safe and stable. But if the dreamer sees that he is not sincere, and prays and worships an idol or anything else in the dream, then the vision warns the dreamer of a dangerous path he is taking. And if the dreamer sees that he is bowing down For a person in a dream, this scene is not benign and indicates poverty, lack of prestige, disappearance of value and power, and all of these adversities come from the dreamer’s lack of faith. God Almighty. Prostrating in a dream to Al-OsaimiAl-Osaimi said that if the dreamer prostrates in a dream, he will receive love and appreciation from others, and enjoy a fragrant reputation among the people. And if the dreamer lived oppressed for many years in his wakefulness and saw that he was worshiping God and asking him for victory in a dream, then the vision portends The individual will defeat the oppressors and gain victory over them, God willing. The sultan who dreams of worshiping the Lord of God

title: Interpretation of a dream about white worms in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Dream interpretation of white worms in a dream for single and married women, as worms are considered repulsive animals for humans, differing in their shape, colors, and sizes. This is something that individuals do not discuss. Interpretation scholars have interpreted worms in a dream with different interpretations, and in our article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about white worms in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of a dream about white worms in a dream: Seeing worms in a dream has many different interpretations and interpretations, as it depends on the social situation. Associated with the vision, in addition to the events that occur in the dream, and among these interpretations is what was narrated by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin explained that worms in a dream indicate women or girls, and that if a person sees worms in his stomach, this means that his children are eating from his money. And if the dreamer finds Worms scattered on his clothes, this indicates that he has been lowered. Likewise, if a person finds worms eating from his body, this is a sign that his children are eating without being stingy with the father’s money. Ibn Sirin believes that if a person sees worms on the ground around him, this indicates that he will gain a higher position. High and strong authority. In addition, seeing worms in a dream means that boys and girls will increase their diet, and God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about worms for one girlThe dream of worms is mentioned as one of the strange dreams that rarely comes to a person’s sleep, as worms are disgusting creatures that It disgusts humans. As for seeing them in a dream, they have a number of interpretations, such as: If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing many worms, this means that many unpleasant things will happen in her life. Also, seeing worms in abundance in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of many sins and that God Almighty is Forgiving and Merciful, so the dreamer must approach God and obey Him. In addition to seeing an unmarried girl in a dream eating worms, this indicates many wrong things that are happening in her life and she must follow the path of goodness until she finds what she desires in her life. And God Almighty knows best. The unseen. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a power outage in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a married woman differs from that for an unmarried girl, as each of them differs in what they are going through in their lives, in addition to their differences depending on circumstances and events. The dream and its interpretations. The following points are: If a married woman dreams of seeing large worms, this indicates many beautiful things that will happen in the married woman’s life. In addition, seeing black worms in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she hears unpleasant news, but she will overcome sad and miserable matters. In her life, and God Almighty knows best.
